channel.title: Buyin High alcher 2m RS GP!
channel.description:
I want someone to script me a high alcher, it is a very simple one it must contain these things:
The time it clicks must vary and not always be the same (not always dead on 3 seconds, maybey vary between 3 and 4) If a random shows the script must pause or stop When running the scar window name must change to google or soemthing similar.
This can be a very simple script as I will never be AFK while this is running. I will be paying 2m RS cash for this.
Thank you

item.title: Buyin High alcher 2m RS GP!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnaz0r Pwnaz0r
item.description:
@Pwnaz0r wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:8, topic:131750”][quote author=kushal link=topic=182562.msg1673804#msg1673804 date=1187105215]
there are a lot of alchers out there, and i dont think its worth spending 2M on, expecially now that SRL 4.0 is coming out.
[/quote]

It will be custom built for him, with round the clock support. SRL 4.0 will mainly be for the GUI updates, with some minor changes elsewhere. Most likely has little impact on alching.[/quote]
Actually for SRL 4, they threw away everything and started over with almost everything but the most minor antirandom snippets(such as bitmaps and dtms etc). The player array will be updated and will be a pain to go through. I suggest that you wait until SRL 4 is out.

Read full topic

item.title: Buyin High alcher 2m RS GP!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I’ll make it for you.

Should it bank or will you use notes?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 09:43:33 AM[/size][hr]K, I’m done. I custom built it for you, so if you have anything you want in particular, let me know, I’ll look into it. I made it in TextEdit because I’m on a Mac, so I haven’t tried compiling it yet. I have to test it on scar (I’ll do it in 2 hours when I get home) and then wait for the new SRL version to come out. Take a look; this is the main loop. It’s nice and simple, the way I like to keep everything.

begin
  SetupScript;
  while (true) do
  begin
    LoginSetup;
    while (g_timesCast < g_alchTimes) do
    begin
      AlchItem;
      if (g_timesCast/10 = trunc(g_timesCast/10)) then
      begin
        OutputProgress;
      end;
    end;
    NextPlayer(true);
  end;
end.

Anti-ban and anti-randoms are included, as well as a simple auto-responder, so you can be afk if you want. You can select what to disguise scar as when it’s running.

I’ll find a middleman if you reply to this and tell me you truly want it.

Read full topic
